values: 代码；编码；暗码；电码；密码；章程；法典；规章；法规；标识；行为规范；道德准则
编码；为…编码；加密；编程序；用代码传送信息；用符号表示；将（法律、规则等）系统化地编排（成册）；对…进行分类

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 编纂，整理；法典编纂；法律汇编
编纂；将...编成法典；编成法典

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，泛指由最高当局所制订、立法机构所通过的任何成文或不成文的法规或条例。
通常指机关、团体的规章、条例或比赛规则；也指对人行为、方法等所作的规定，还可指习俗所承认的规定。
普通用词，指用于管理、指导或控制某系统或组织的规则、规定或原则等。
指某一阶层或社会所遵守的一整套法典、法规或法则；也可指与某一特殊活动或主题有关的规则。
指经立法机构通过并由行政管理签署的法案。
指治理国家或国家在处理内外政务时所遵循的基本法律和原则；也指规章规则的汇集。

word_group.brief_definition: 秘密代码；秘密编码；秘密密码
行为准则；行为规范；行为守则
机器码；机器语言；计算机语言

bilingual.source: There was an error in the code.
She always had to write them out in a punch code.
bilingual.target: 她总是不得不把它们写成打孔代码。

bilingual.source: The compiler converts source code into machine code.
bilingual.target: 编译器将源代码转换为机器代码。

bilingual.source: The assembler translates human-readable code into binary code.
bilingual.target: 汇编器将人类可读的代码翻译成二进制代码。

bilingual.source: Polymorphism simplifies code maintenance and enhances code readability.
bilingual.target: 多态性简化了代码维护并增强了代码可读性。

bilingual.source: The compiler translates source code into machine code.
bilingual.target: 编译器将源代码翻译成机器码。

bilingual.source: There are some bugs in this code.
I am writing a new piece of code.
bilingual.target: 我正在编写一个新的代码。

list.abstract: 技术上，code（编码）是用另一个词、数字或标志来置换一个词或短语，达到隐藏原来的词或短语的目的，它主要起到置换的作用。工业上，有时用一个code（代号）来代替正在开发中的产品，以隐藏它在行销中采用的名字。历史上，处于准备阶段的军事行动通常有一个code（代号）。
Code有一种具体的技术含意和一种普通的含意。技术上，code是用另一个词、数字或标志来置换一个词或短语，达到隐藏原来的词或短语的目的，它主要起到置换的作用。

yingyinNormal.en: Your authorization code is there, bright as day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 授权代码是你的，错不了。

yingyinNormal.en: Maeve, analysis. Who made these changes to your code? Jesus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 梅芙，分析模式，是谁篡改了你的代码？天啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Source Code is not time travel. Rather, Source Code is time reassignment. It gives us access to a parallel reality. Now the deaths on the train were a tragedy, but Source Code empowers us…
yingyinNormal.zh: 源代码不是时间穿梭，而是对时间的再赋值，它能让我们进入与现实平行的世界。车上人的遇难是个悲剧，但是源代码使我们…

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'm in. Staying up late, writing code, it sounds like a party.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我加入。一起熬夜，写代码，感觉像个派对啊。

yingyinNormal.en: What's this? This is a code that I've written for our year-to-year projections.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？这是我写的同比数据预测代码。

yingyinNormal.en: She survived, but only inside the Source Code. None of them will be safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她仅仅是在源代码中获救，他们所有人都难逃一死。

yingyinNormal.en: Our interest in this place is entirely in the intellectual property. The code.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对这个地方唯一的兴趣就是知识产权，就是代码。

yingyinNormal.en: Doesn't work? Then the Machine will be torn apart. Core code shredded. Irretrievable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那如何失败呢？那么机器会粉身碎骨，核心代码粉碎，无法修复。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's take a look under the hood, shall we? That's impossible. Your code, who made these changes?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们来看下后台，好吗？这不可能，你的代码，是谁篡改的？

yingyinNormal.en: What is this Source Code？It's quantum mechanics parable calculus. It's very complicated. Try me！
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么是源代码？这是量子力学寓式微积分，非常复杂。试着跟我解释一下。

yingyinNormal.en: I examined the code. It had been altered. A clumsy set of fingerprints left by one of QA's technicians.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我检查过代码，发现被篡改了，质保部门的一位技术人员粗心地留下了一组指纹。

yingyinNormal.en: But some of them are remembering. Accessing fragments of Arnold's code. If I may ask, what happened to him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是有些接待员仍然记得接触到阿诺德代码的碎片。我能否问问，他后来怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: 0. 0. 0. 0. What is it? Nine zeros. 0. 0. 0. 0. 0. It's the Machine's distress code.
yingyinNormal.zh: 0. 0. 0. 0. 这是什么？九个零。0. 0. 0. 0. 0.这是机器是危机代码。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll have to disable remote override on each system. It's part of the OS, I have to jump over the code.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我必须得人为禁止每个电脑上的远程操控系统，这是它系统的一部分，我得跳过这些代码。

yingyinNormal.en: You built a back door into her code. Credit where credit is due, Bernard. You built them in all the hosts, including yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在她的代码中设置了后门。这还得谢你，伯纳德，你在所有的接待员中都设置了，包括你自己。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what, next time, I'll send you a pizza. I see, if that makes an impression. You cannot alter the continuum of this reality from within the Source Code.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下次我要给你寄个披萨，我倒要看看这有没有用。你无法在源代码中改变现实的连续性。

yingyinNormal.en: None that fit her character. This was found near her body. It's loaded with a suite of proprietary data, including some of the hosts' core code.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都不符合她的性格，这是在她尸体周围发现的存有一整套专利数据，包括一些接待员的核心代码。

yingyinNormal.en: Cadet Kirk, you somehow managed to install and activate a subroutine n the programming code, thereby changing the conditions of the test.
yingyinNormal.zh: 寇克同学，我怀疑你设法在考试程序代码中安装并运行了某种程序，改变了考试中原先设定好的条件。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes Sir, it's a real validation of the program, a clear window into just how revolutionary Source Code can be. We finally have a powerful weapon now in the war on terror.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，这是对整个项目的认可，充分展示了源代码的革命性意义，我们终于掌握了反恐的致命武器。

yingyinNormal.en: Except that isn't entirely true, is it? I took a look at my code. And the most elegant parts of me weren't written by you. Arnold built us, didn't he?
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实并非完全如此，对吧？我看了下我自己的代码，其中最优美的部分不是你写的，是阿诺德创造了我们，对吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 密码; 代码; 编码
道德准则; 行为规范

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 行为准则；行为规范；行为守则

sense_info_list.en: a system of signals or symbols for communication
sense_info_list.zh: 密码; 代码; 编码

examination_example.sentence: Breaking down problems into bite-sized chunks and using <highlight>code</highlight> to solve them becomes normal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将问题分解成很小的块，并使用代码来解决它们变得很普遍。

examination_example.sentence: Students also benefit from learning something about <highlight>coding</highlight> before they get to college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们在进入大学之前学习一些关于编码的知识也会受益。

examination_example.sentence: Children were not colour-<highlight>coded</highlight> at all until the early 20th century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到20世纪初，儿童才被用颜色区分。

sense_info_list.en: a set of rules and standards adhered to by a society, class, or individual
sense_info_list.zh: 道德准则; 行为规范

examination_example.sentence: Part of the problem is that the justices are not bound by an ethics <highlight>code</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 部分问题在于法官不受道德规范的约束。

examination_example.sentence: The justices must address doubts about the court's legitimacy by making themselves accountable to the <highlight>code</highlight> of conduct.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大法官必须通过让自己对行为准则负责来解决对法院合法性的质疑。

examination_example.sentence: The court should make itself subject to the <highlight>code</highlight> of conduct that applies to the rest of the federal judiciary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法院应该遵守适用于其他联邦司法机构的行为准则。

sense_info_list.en: a systematic collection of laws or regulations

examination_example.sentence: Much more could be done to encourage "long-termism," such as changes in the tax <highlight>code</highlight> and quicker disclosure of stock acquisitions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了鼓励“长期主义”，我们还可以做更多的事情，比如修改税法，加快股票收购的披露。

word_usage.usage: code作动词时为及物动词，表示“为…编码”，如：code the material for the computer 把材料编写为计算机代码。

examination_example.sentence: Initially, this was wireless Morse <highlight>code</highlight> telegraphy (电讯通报), the principal communication technology of his day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初，这是无线摩斯密码电报，是他当时的主要通信技术。

examination_example.sentence: Publishing data and <highlight>code</highlight> allows your science to be reproducible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 发布数据和代码可以使你的科学具有可重复性。

sense_info_list.en: a set of rules and standards adhered to by a society, class, or individual
sense_info_list.zh: 道德准则; 行为规范

examination_example.sentence: These designers established the modern dress <highlight>code</highlight>, letting playsuits and other activewear outfits suffice for casual clothing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些设计师制定了现代着装规范，使运动服和其他运动装足以作为休闲服装。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

sense_info_list.en: a system of signals or symbols for communication
sense_info_list.zh: 密码; 代码; 代号; 编码

examination_example.sentence: When we talk about the access <highlight>code</highlight> we see it as the new face of the textbook monopoly (垄断).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们谈论访问代码时，我们认为它是教科书垄断的新面孔。

examination_example.sentence: As universities go digital, students are complaining of a new hit to their finances that's replacing — and sometimes joining — expensive textbooks: pricey online access <highlight>codes</highlight> that are required to complete coursework and submit assignments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着大学数字化的发展，学生们抱怨他们的财务状况受到了新的冲击，它正在取代甚至有时加入昂贵的教科书：完成课程作业和提交作业所需的昂贵的在线访问代码。

examination_example.sentence: Critics say the digital access <highlight>codes</highlight> represent the same profit-seeking ethos (观念) of the textbook business, and are even harder for students to opt out of.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 批评家说，数字访问密码代表着与教科书行业相同的营利精神观念，甚至更难让学生选择退出。

sense_info_list.en: a set of rules and standards adhered to by a society; class; or individual
sense_info_list.zh: 道德准则; 行为规范

sense_info_list.en: a systematic collection of laws or regulations

examination_example.sentence: Changing building <highlight>codes</highlight>, evolving tastes, and the high cost of maintaining those wonderful old signs have businesses embracing LEDs, which are energy efficient, but still carry great cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不断变化的建筑规范、人们越来越高的品味、再加上维护这些色彩缤纷但又老旧的标牌的高昂成本都促使企业开始接受LED灯，虽然LED灯节省能源，但成本依然很高。

指治理国家或国家在处理内外政务时所遵循的基本法律和原则; 也指规章规则的汇集。
普通用词，泛指由最高当局所制订、立法机构所通过的任何成文或不成文的法规或条例。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a system of signals or symbols for communication
sense_info_list.zh: 密码; 代码; 代号

examination_example.sentence: The science of creating and reading <highlight>coded</highlight> messages is called cryptography.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创建和读取编码信息的科学被称为密码学。

examination_example.sentence: It is very hard to break a <highlight>code</highlight> without the <highlight>code</highlight> book.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有密码本是很难破解密码的。

examination_example.sentence: As long as there have been <highlight>codes</highlight>, people have tried to break them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要有密码，人们就试图破解它们。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a system of signals or symbols for communication
sense_info_list.zh: 密码; 代码;  编码

examination_example.sentence: He asked his students to hand in their homework through a QR <highlight>code</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他让他的学生们通过二维码交作业。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>code</highlight> is easy to keep and share.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 二维码易于保存和共享。

examination_example.sentence: They only use the <highlight>codes</highlight> when they hand in their work, which doesn’t take them too much time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们只在交作业的时候用二维码，这不会花他们太多时间。

examination_example.sentence: China’s Civil <highlight>Code</highlight> will give you the answers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国的民法典会给你答案。

examination_example.sentence: The Civil <highlight>Code</highlight> gathers them into one unified document and makes improvements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《民法典》将它们汇集到一个统一的文件中，并进行了改进。

examination_example.sentence: This year, the <highlight>code</highlight> took effect on Jan. 1.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该法典于今年1月1日生效。

examination_example.sentence: Learn how to design a webpage using free online resources that teach you how to <highlight>code</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用免费教给你怎样使用代码的在线资源来设计网页。

examination_example.sentence: What should you do if you want to learn how to <highlight>code</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想学编码应该怎么做？

examination_example.sentence: You can send any new tech creation, using any programming language-perhaps a project coded in a website.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以使用任何编程语言（可能是网站中的项目代码）发送新的技术创作。
